short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximizes the YouTube video player to fill the window and auto-adjusts to the highest video quality for the best viewing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tuwube is the perfect extension for YouTube enthusiasts who crave the ultimate viewing experience. With Tuwube, you can maximize the YouTube video player to fill your entire browser window, giving you the biggest view possible without entering fullscreen mode. This means no more distractions from your browser tabs and controls, allowing you to focus entirely on your content.

In addition to providing an enhanced viewing area, Tuwube also ensures that you're always watching in the best quality available. The extension automatically switches the video quality to the highest possible setting, so you never have to manually adjust the quality again.
